name: Pixel Block Battle Gun 3D FPS - TPS Minecraft like
name_original: Pixel Block Battle Gun 3D FPS - TPS Minecraft like
description:
Pixel Block Battle Gun 3D FPS

Get ready for the most exciting 3d pixel block battle multi-player shooting game. Pixel Block Battle Gun 3D FPS is an awesome shooting game with exciting gameplay.

 

FULL OF ACTION

Welcome to a world full of action and intense shooting. Join online, multiplayer battle gun in a 3D world. Fight against real people online in different multi-player modes. An intense, PVP game, with a pixel block graphic style.

 

A BIG MAP, AND MORE TO COME!

Enter a big, post-apocalypse map, and survive shootings and intense fights! More maps are coming soon!

 

LOTS OF WEAPONS AND CHARACTERS

Play, win, collect coins, and level up to unlock new characters and weapons to buy. Customize your character and weapons as you wish (coming soon).

 

INTENSE MULTIPLAYER

Test your skills against real players around the world! Take part in a battle royale and free for all with up to 15 players at the same time and show what you're made of! In tournaments, there are special arenas made to test your skills and those of your opponents to the maximum!

 

BEAUTIFUL, OPTIMIZED 3D GRAPHIC

Beautiful 3D graphics, lightweight, and optimized to run even on older devices. No lag, enjoy a smooth, enjoyable, and relaxing gaming experience.

 

 

 Game Features: 

- Simple, intuitive, and super fun gameplay.

- Constantly updated with new content, levels, enemies, and more.

- Online, in multiplayer against other real players!

- Beautiful 3D graphics.

- Optimized, lag-free, to run even on older devices!

 

Upcoming updates:

 - New weapons

- New characters

- New maps

- New modes

- More customization

 

 

!EARLY ACCESS!

Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates

 

Hurry up and download this epic mini-golf, fun sports game: Pixel Block Battle Gun 3D FPS, for FREE!

Stay tuned, new updates are coming soon!
